name: Turn The Lights On
description:
This is a game made by the team Keep Calm for the Epic Game Jam 2017

Your flashlight has 8 hours of battery life.

You must find the clues to get back the power supply and turn on the lights.

But something is hidding in the dark... Flash it before it catches you!

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • SPACE to jump.
  • E or Click to interact with objects.
  • TAB to show the inventory.
  • ESC to Pause.

Collaborators links:

  • https://jnyrr5.itch.io/
  • https://andgarciaz.itch.io/
  • https://sdflogan.itch.io/
  • https://malafar94.itch.io/
